Its pretty well known how to do a quick pub/sub with atom pub. If we
get lo=
ads and loads of consumers though it might be beneficial to say
hang a http=
 connection and push results down the pipe in near real
time as opposed to =
polling (performance optimization only). This can
be done in a generic way,=
 does anyone happen to know of a system that
just does that out of the box =
as opposed to building it?

-- 
Le doute n'est pas une condition agr=E9able=
, mais la certitude est absurde.
